name: bbox
description:
The bbox command calculates and manipulates bounding boxes. It can:

- Calculate bbox from OSM file
- Create bbox from coordinates or center+radius
- Add buffer or expand by percentage
- Output in multiple formats (osmfast, overpass, geojson)

Useful for preparing filter parameters.

options.--from-coords: Create bbox from coordinates (min_lon min_lat max_lon max_lat)
options.--from-center: Create bbox from center point (lat lon)
options.--round: Round coordinates to N decimal places
options.-f, --format: Output format: text, json, geojson, osm, overpass (default: text)

output:
Bounding box information:
- Min/Max coordinates
- Center point
- Dimensions in km
- Formatted for various tools
